揔字的基本解释

揔
zǒng
古同“总”。
持；揽。

揔
sōng
手进物。

揔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǒng］
［《廣韻》作孔切，上董，精。］
亦作“惣1”。
(1)同“總”。统领，率领。
(2)同“總”。总共。
(3)持；揽。

揔字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　揔； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页442第02
【集韻】【韻會】?祖動切。同摠。俗作捴摠，非。　又【集韻】蘇叢切，音?。手進物也。　又作弄切，音粽。與偬同。倥偬也。摠字原从囙作。

揔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
揔字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zǒng］
["Guangyun" made Kongqie, Shangdong, Jing. ]
Also known as "惣1".
(1) Same as "total". Command, lead.
(2) Same as "total". In total.
(3) Hold; Hold.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　揔; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 442 02
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? The ancestor moves to cut. The same. Popular as a mongoose, non.　[Jiyun] Su Congqie, sound?. Hand into things also.　 Fooled and cut again, sound dumplings. And the same. Suddenly. The original character was made from choking.
